DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study Healthy Adults Vaccinated With One Dose Smallpox Vaccine ( LISTER Strain )

DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Subject vaccinate complete Phase II VVL04 trial . Informed consent form sign . Subject able comply trial procedure . Subject entitle national social security .
